thread.title: GOP knocks Cuomo over gun-control stance
thread.title_full: GOP knocks Cuomo over gun-control stance - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: GOP knocks Cuomo over gun-control stance
text: State GOP chairman Ed Cox criticized Gov. Andrew Cuomo today for suggesting that Democrats in Congress shut down the government over gun control. Cuomo on Friday took to the airwaves to blast Washington for not enacting gun-control laws in the wake of another mass shooting, this one at a community college in Oregon. But Cox [...] The post GOP knocks Cuomo over gun-control stance appeared first on Politics on the Hudson. Click on the headline for the rest of this blog post ... ...
